## Demo dataset
`mtcars` dataset

```{r}
data(mtcars)
head(mtcars)
```

## Calculating correlation coefficient 
```{r}
C <- cor(mtcars)
```

## Using corrplot package
```{r}
require(corrplot)
corrplot(C)
corrplot(C, method="number")
corrplot(C, type="upper")
```

## Using psych package
```{r}
require(psych)
data(Bechtoldt.1)
sorted <- mat.sort(Bechtoldt.1,fa(Bechtoldt.1,5))
cor.plot(sorted)

```
